name: Zombie Man and the Legion of Crime
name_original: Zombie Man and the Legion of Crime
description: Brad Divine , police detective is killed in a botched robbery gone wrong and his body is removed and taken to a science laboratory where he is reanimated and given powers and abilities such as augmented strength, speed, agility plus enhanced intelligence. He can also relive the last moments of a victim life by absorbing thoughts and memories. Together with his partner Derrick, Dr. Susan Johnson ( Voodoo Priestess/Scientist) and an innocent girl named Jenny Brad Dovine aka Zombie-man battles the criminal underworld that tearing apart the city and has people caught in the grip of fear, crime, cruelty, and evil. He takes of the bosses and overlords in attempting to tear down one criminal enterprise after another before more innocent life is lost.
